title: WebServ4u-Home page flipkart daily quiz
description: daily flipkart trivia quiz answers today

slidingImageDescription: daily Quiz image such as daily trivia quiz and quiz time
quizDescriptionDescription: Here you have to get quick live updates for each Trivia Quiz Question everyday at 11:50pm.By answering these Quiz Questions you can win many gift vouchers,coupons,gifts,super coins etc.Make sure you have to follow official telegram channel to get daily imediate answers for each Quiz
howToPlayTitle: how to play today's flipkart trivia questions and answers
howToPlaydescription: Here all the required steps to play flipkart daily quiz 1. first of all Download or Open the Flipkart App in your android phone 2. Login or signup into flipkart app 3. Go To Game section in Flipkart app in the bottom-right side of your android app 4. You will see the banner of Daily Trivia ,Beat The Genius,Bigg Buzz,Ladies vs Gentlema,Guess what,Snake Smash, Quiz Timeetc and many more...
